originalText.text: I came to pick out two wedding bands and they were extremely helpful in finding out what works with my budget. The sizing was off by a little but they were able to resize the ring on the spot until it fit perfect. Very underrated spot I’m glad my friend told me about it

text.text: I came to pick out two wedding bands and they were extremely helpful in finding out what works with my budget. The sizing was off by a little but they were able to resize the ring on the spot until it fit perfect. Very underrated spot I’m glad my friend told me about it

originalText.text: I had to quickly pay college tuition and Danny offered exactly what I needed for my gold jewelry. I checked prices in the area, but it was the best deal. However, he was only able to give me 50% that day and asked me to return in two days. When I came back in a few days, he gave me another 50%, plus he rounded up a number$ in my favor. Very honest man!

originalText.text: Recently went to this jewelry store and the owner Danny was incredibly nice and gives very good deals on beautiful items compared to other stores. He works with your budget and gives you something better than expected. Usually always open and I definitely recommend purchasing your jewelry here!

text.text: Recently went to this jewelry store and the owner Danny was incredibly nice and gives very good deals on beautiful items compared to other stores. He works with your budget and gives you something better than expected. Usually always open and I definitely recommend purchasing your jewelry here!

originalText.text: Great business with good jewelry. I bought 2 beautiful gold cross-necklaces there for myself and I wear 1 or the other every day. Honest owner who is fair with pricing. He is also fair when buying your stuff, too. Highly recommended.

text.text: Great business with good jewelry. I bought 2 beautiful gold cross-necklaces there for myself and I wear 1 or the other every day. Honest owner who is fair with pricing. He is also fair when buying your stuff, too. Highly recommended.

originalText.text: Bought an engagement ring from them. Honestly the nicest people. I shopped around to multiple different stores in the area but they by far had the best deals and we're really honest and friendly. Thanks Danny I will definitely be seeing you soon.
